name: There's Nothing Like Family
description:
After years of school and hard work, he’s finally gotten the job he’s dreamed of having since a child, a game designer! In the coming years after his time as a game designer, MJ has realized a few successful games and is truly living out his dream; or is he? Even with his success and his dream job, he feels like something is missing. This “something” is his family. After being so closely connected to them all his life, he left them behind after becoming a game designer. Now he knows what he needs to do. He needs to call his parents, apologize, really make things right. However, just after picking up his cellphone to call, he decided to call them the next day and put it back down. After getting up from his bed, he made his way to the door, but what waited for him on the other side, would be something that reminded him of the importance of family.

Each sprite/item can be interacted with, all playing a role in MJ remembering his past, how his family helped him, or the joy he experienced with them.
